> Shouldn't be too hard to extract them, any particular format you 
want the
> text file in?  Perhaps one object per line, tab-delimited?

I would want all the information [located in grid file] from "3-byte 
header: 'FSS'" to "m bytes == characters on this line" in the text 
file.  Format the information however you choose; readibility of 
information and neatness count, though.
